page.description: Returns the number of characters in a string.
page.discussion: LEN() returns an integer equal to the number of characters in the Input_String. The length of a NULL (empty) string is 0.
page.example: ' if FIRSTNAME is defined as a 15-character field ? len(FIRSTNAME) = 15 ' if FIRSTNAME is a variable that contains "Steve" ? len( trim(FIRSTNAME) ) = 5
